summary.professional_summary: Senior Software Engineering Manager with 15+ years of experience leading globally distributed teams to deliver scalable, enterprise-grade, cloud-native platforms and solutions. Demonstrated excellence in people management, with a proven ability to oversee the full employee lifecycle (including talent acquisition, onboarding, performance development, and separation) with a focus on building high-performing, inclusive teams. Expertise spans Agile delivery, DevOps strategy, platform modernization, and cross-functional program leadership. Recognized for aligning technical initiatives with business objectives, fostering a culture of accountability and continuous improvement, and driving measurable outcomes in complex organizational environments.

employment.title: Senior Engineering Manager
employment.summary: Led global engineering and analyst teams delivering enterprise applications; owned full employee lifecycle; aligned technical strategy with business outcomes.

experience.text: Led global teams of software engineers and analysts across multiple functional groups responsible for delivering scalable, high-quality, enterprise applications; owned hiring, onboarding, performance, and development.
Partnered with senior leadership (directors and VPs), HR, and PMO to align technical strategy with business objectives.
Directed the enterprise-wide implementation of ServiceNow SPM, improving visibility and execution across demand-to-delivery workflows.
Integrated Test Management and advanced reporting in ServiceNow for ~200 users; facilitated user training for 5+ teams.
Developed and delivered AI training programs for individual contributors.
Evolved DevOps pipeline adopting GitHub Actions and Harness.io to navigate changing tech landscapes.

Oversaw Salesforce DevOps migration from Bamboo to GitHub Actions to Harness.io; retired Change Sets; streamlined deployments and reduced configuration deployment time by half while ensuring traceability and compliance.
Supervised a Salesforce DevOps intern producing functional prototypes and knowledge transfer with GitHub Actions and SF CLI.
Built Power BI dashboards for SLA accountability using DAX, Power Query M, and REST API connections; achieved ~99%+ SLA adherence.
Orchestrated cyber incident response affecting 150+ applications; led outage bridge, CMDB remediation, and restoration efforts.
Standardized work management practices; realigned Scrum Master support to ensure consistent methodology across enterprise app teams.
Transitioned Enterprise Applications to a hybrid Waterfall/Agile model in ServiceNow, improving visibility across dev, ops, and break-fix.
Partnered with HR to draft a new job architecture framework supporting career development and organizational clarity.
Applied Harness.io certification learnings to optimize CI pipelines.
Drove a culture of continuous learning and accountability, reaching 100% completion of team training and development goals.

employment.title: Engineering Manager
employment.summary: Managed global teams delivering internal product applications and platform services; aligned priorities with stakeholders; scaled DevOps practices.

experience.text: Managed global teams of 7â€“14 engineers and consultants across the U.S., U.K., and India; partnered with product, architecture, and business stakeholders.
Managed two cross-functional teams (Analysts, Engineers, QA, Technical PM) across multiple business areas.
Oversaw architecture and delivery of a full-stack Node.js and React Sales Discovery app integrated with standard and custom Salesforce REST APIs.
Owned hiring, onboarding, goal-setting, performance reviews, engagement, career planning, and retention.
Designed a custom Salesforce DevOps deployment strategy using SFDX and Bamboo/Bitbucket Server, improving reliability and developer efficiency.
Coordinated Salesforce backups and release pipelines to improve recovery readiness and audit compliance.
Developed Jira dashboards and custom reports to track sprints, link work to releases, and improve transparency.
Delivered large-scale engineering projects in partnership with apps, sales, service, and product teams.
Championed Agile methodologies, facilitated Scrum adoption, and drove continuous improvement.
Mentored interns and junior engineers to grow platform familiarity and skills.
Influenced platform governance and best practices, including UI/UX and HCI decisions and tooling selection.
Implemented Slack workflow integrations to streamline issue triage.
Created flow diagrams and documentation to support cross-team collaboration and clarity.

employment.title: Development Supervisor
employment.summary: Supervised local and offshore engineering teams for Salesforce implementations; contributed to architecture and modernization.

experience.text: Managed development resources across U.S. and India to ensure coordination and delivery across time zones.
Designed technical architecture for a new Salesforce Service Cloud implementation aligned to enterprise integration standards.
Oversaw launch of a new Salesforce instance and migrated the Employee Portal (Experience Cloud).
Led hiring and onboarding for engineering roles during team expansion.
Served as Salesforce SME and mentor for cross-functional teams and centers of excellence.
Guided application architecture, UI/UX best practices, and technical standards.

employment.title: Software Engineer Team Lead
employment.summary: Led 10+ engineers across internal business units; set development standards and drove platform consistency.

experience.text: Defined coding standards, documentation practices, and code review processes to improve maintainability and consistency.
Developed a centralized CSS/HTML style guide based on Twitter Bootstrap to standardize internal UI.
Facilitated knowledge-sharing sessions to grow Salesforce development expertise.
Collaborated on application architecture, usability, testing, and integration strategies.
Supported hiring and interviews to grow team capabilities.
Implemented collaboration tools and documentation repositories for knowledge management.

employment.title: Applications Developer
employment.summary: Built enterprise apps, Salesforce customizations, and integrations; improved UI and workflow efficiency.

experience.text: Built Salesforce cloud applications using Apex, jQuery, AJAX, and custom CSS for responsive UI.
Developed reusable type-ahead lookup in Salesforce to improve efficiency and reduce input errors.
Implemented local .NET apps with REST/Web Services for Salesforce connectivity.
Enhanced and maintained a Java-based Email-to-Case solution to improve ticket routing.
Collaborated with analysts and end users on requirements and system refinements.

employment.title: Applications Developer
employment.summary: Delivered internal web apps for CRM, order entry, and portals; improved usability, data handling, and efficiency.

experience.text: Built and maintained applications using C#.NET, Apex (Salesforce), JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.
Customized Salesforce CRM to support workflows and customer interactions.
Developed command-line and shell scripts for data processing and batch tasks.
Used advanced Excel to prepare, transform, and load large datasets across systems.
Supported rapid iteration while maintaining code stability and documentation standards.

employment.title: Manager of Enterprise Applications
employment.summary: Led enterprise applications team across ERP, CRM, BI, web, and e-commerce; owned delivery and maintenance.

experience.text: Managed a cross-functional team supporting Salesforce, ERP, and internal applications.
Supervised development, maintenance, and integration of web and back-office systems.
Mentored team members and provided coaching and career development.
Conducted performance reviews and facilitated goal-setting across technical roles.
Prioritized and assigned project work based on business needs and interdependencies.

employment.title: Systems Analyst
employment.summary: Supported CRM and internal platforms via development and integrations; partnered with users and vendors.

experience.text: Designed and developed enhancements using C#.NET and Salesforce Apex.
Managed vendor and consultant relationships to align on deliverables and timelines.
Led multi-system integrations to streamline data flow and improve reporting accuracy.
Built web interfaces and backend processes supporting internal departments.
Documented functional requirements and technical workflows.

employment.title: Teaching Assistant
employment.summary: Supported undergraduate CS courses; provided instruction and evaluation across multiple languages.

experience.text: Graded assignments in COBOL, C++, and SQL for freshman to senior students.
Advised students on programming techniques, syntax, and debugging.
Assisted professors with course materials and classroom activities.
Explained complex concepts one-on-one to improve understanding.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Applied Computer Science

experience.text: Developed transferable programming skills emphasizing logic structures and language-agnostic problem solving.
Gained foundational computing and architecture understanding via C++, Assembly (IBM JCL), and COBOL.
Excelled in speech, writing, literature, communications, and analytical courses.
Completed UNIX/Linux coursework laying foundations for Bash shell scripting used in DevOps.
Held multiple summer internships providing IT support in enterprise environments.

certifications.name: Harness Certified Continuous Integration Developer
certifications.description: Demonstrated expertise in designing, implementing, and managing CI pipelines using Harness.io.

certifications.name: Salesforce Trailhead Ranger
certifications.description: Achieved Ranger status by earning 1,000+ points through completing modules and projects on the Salesforce platform.
